analysis.description:
INF.startDate (/unique_chucks/29/0x26c69e1b26553030a455e6bfd717bda20167a056.sol#102-103) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0x26c69e1b26553030a455e6bfd717bda20167a056.sol#213-225)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/29/0x26c69e1b26553030a455e6bfd717bda20167a056.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/29/0x26c69e1b26553030a455e6bfd717bda20167a056.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0x26c69e1b26553030a455e6bfd717bda20167a056.sol#80) is not in mixedCase
